code: @Test public void testByteArrayToHex() throws Exception {     assertEquals("0123456789abcdef", byteArrayToHexString(array)). }

@Test public void roundtrip() {     String hexchars = "01234567890abcdefABCDEF".     for (int x = 0. x < 100000. x++) {         int r = (int) (Math.random() * 50).         StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(r).         for (int y = 0. y < r. y++) {             b.append(hexchars.charAt((int) (Math.random() * hexchars.length()))).         }         String hexString = b.toString().toLowerCase().         if (b.length() % 2 > 0) {             // add the padded byte if odd             assertEquals(hexString + '0', byteArrayToHexString(hexToByteArray(hexString))).         } else {             assertEquals(hexString, byteArrayToHexString(hexToByteArray(hexString))).         }     } }
